objects.specification: A large rectangular exhibition floor panel with a smooth, neutral-tone surface and a slight reflective finish. It forms the foundation of the booth, providing an even, sturdy platform and ensuring a clean, modern look suitable for showcasing vehicles. The floor is finished in a subtle gray color to complement all display elements without drawing attention away from the centerpiece.

A solid rectangular north wall panel rising three meters tall with a smooth neutral-tone finish. It encloses the back of the booth, providing privacy and a canvas for lighting or graphics if needed. The surface is uniform and matte to prevent glare and highlight interior elements.

A solid rectangular south wall panel rising three meters tall with a matching neutral-tone finish. Positioned opposite the north wall, it encloses the front of the booth and frames the entrance opening. The surface is matte to reduce reflections and maintain a cohesive aesthetic.

An east side wall panel standing three meters tall with a smooth, neutral-tone finish. It encloses one side of the booth and complements the other walls for a consistent enclosure. The flat surface is ideal for mounting additional displays or signage.

A west side wall panel standing three meters tall with a smooth, neutral-tone finish. It mirrors the east wall to complete the enclosure and offers a blank backdrop for banners or graphics. The finish is matte to avoid distracting reflections.

A sleek modern sedan with a vibrant red, high-gloss finish designed as the showroom centerpiece. It features sculpted body lines, premium alloy wheels, and tinted windows. The car is detailed with realistic features including headlights, grille, mirrors, and a polished paint job to maximize visual impact.

A modern reception desk with clean, angular lines and a smooth surface in a complementary neutral tone. It has an integrated countertop for brochures and a concealed lower shelf for storage. The design is minimalist, sturdy, and welcoming for visitor engagement.

A tall vertical banner showcasing the car brand’s logo and graphics in bright, eye-catching colors. The banner material is semi-matte fabric, stretched over a slim frame. It stands prominently on the north wall, visible from within the booth.

A tall vertical banner showcasing the car brand’s logo and graphics in bright, eye-catching colors. The banner material is semi-matte fabric, stretched over a slim frame. It stands prominently on the south wall, welcoming visitors at the entrance.

A small round meeting table with a smooth tabletop surface and sturdy central pedestal. The tabletop is neutral-tone laminate with a subtle texture. The base is metal with a matching finish, creating a clean focal point for discussions.

A comfortable visitor chair with cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in a neutral fabric. The chair has slim metal legs and ergonomic curves. It is designed for casual seating around a small table.

A comfortable visitor chair with cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in a neutral fabric. The chair has slim metal legs and ergonomic curves. It is designed for casual seating around a small table.

A comfortable visitor chair with cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in a neutral fabric. The chair has slim metal legs and ergonomic curves. It is designed for casual seating around a small table.

A comfortable visitor chair with cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in a neutral fabric. The chair has slim metal legs and ergonomic curves. It is designed for casual seating around a small table.

A compact cylindrical spotlight housing mounted to the ceiling, with a built-in adjustable beam. It has a white finish and directs a focused beam downwards to highlight the demo car with crisp illumination and minimal spill light.

A compact cylindrical spotlight housing mounted to the ceiling, with a built-in adjustable beam. It has a white finish and directs a focused beam downwards to illuminate the reception desk area clearly.
A decorative plant pot with a matte ceramic finish in neutral tones, containing a lush green plant with broad leaves. Designed to add a touch of natural aesthetics and soften the booth corners.
A decorative plant pot with a matte ceramic finish in neutral tones, containing a lush green plant with broad leaves. Designed to add a touch of natural aesthetics and soften the booth corners.
